A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A huge disappointment from start to finish. This movie tarnishes the classic series charecters\, wastes the new series charecters and takes everything that was moderately interesting from the previous movie and just casually throws it away. The plot relies heavily on poor or ridiculous decision making by charecters\, there are no meaningful or interesting answers to any questions set up in FA and the characterisation of many of both the new and old charecters is hugely flawed. There are a few moments of quality and some strong performances\, with Adam Driver in particular really shining\, but this is nowhere near enough to save this movie.
